channel.title: Books on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Let's see what happens.

item.title: How to Read a Book
item.description: Then I try to install a habit for reading from time to time. Previous attempt was Faust that weights 2 kilos because of big format and stylistically different but exceptional pictures on every other page. Such pictures were competing with images in the text but I enjoyed both. One notable experience such book can give is when you are trying to analyze through some text and turn the page and see some unexpected picture.
